definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]

sentences.english: Some day I will reciprocate your kindness to me.
sentences.chinese: 總有一天我會報答你對我的恩德。

sentences.english: Ndesandjo, who works in strategic marketing, had previously refused all interviews.
sentences.chinese: 恩德桑喬從事戰略營銷工作，他曾拒絕所有的採訪。

sentences.english: "No one will benefit more from this than Europeans, " Enders said recently.
sentences.chinese: “沒有人會比歐洲人從中受益更多，”恩德斯最近說。

sentences.english: Mr Ndesandjo is not obviously wealthy, though.
sentences.chinese: 不過，顯然，恩德桑喬先生並不富裕。

sentences.english: Always remember that here is Journey to Guanyin urged him to refrain from eating demon Ende.
sentences.chinese: 這裏八戒是時時記得觀音曾勸他不要爲妖喫人的恩德。

sentences.english: Pendry's project is one of several around the world experimenting with invisibility .
sentences.chinese: 潑恩德利的項目是全球幾個隱形實驗項目之一。

sentences.english: I will repay your benefaction one day.
sentences.chinese: 總有一天我會報答你對我的恩德。

sentences.english: I have set the wheels in motion to sell Endsleigh Court.
sentences.chinese: 我已着手出售恩德斯勒公館。

sentences.english: Ndesandjo said he did not want to touch on any political themes in his novel.
sentences.chinese: 恩德桑喬說他不想在他的小說中涉及任何政治話題。

sentences.english: Yandry and Ysilla had risen with the sun and were going about their business.
sentences.chinese: 楊恩德里和伊西拉隨太陽昇起回到了他們的崗位。

sentences.english: For many North Enders it still is.
sentences.chinese: 因爲許多人北方的恩德斯它依然是。

sentences.english: A town of southern Uganda on Lake Victoria.
sentences.chinese: 恩德比烏干達南部城市，位於維多利亞湖畔。

sentences.english: Ndesandjo said he would publish his autobiography in the next few months.
sentences.chinese: 恩德喬桑表示其自傳將在今後數月內出版。

sentences.english: After a time even Yandry stopped pushing.
sentences.chinese: 一會兒就連楊恩德里也停止了撐篙。

sentences.english: Yandry pulled up the anchor, slid one of the long poles off the cabin roof, and pushed them off.
sentences.chinese: 楊恩德里升起錨，從艙頂拖下一根長杆然後起航了。

sentences.english: Yandry said we ought to throw you back, but the lad forbade it.
sentences.chinese: 楊恩德里認爲我們把你扔回去比較好，但是男孩沒讓。

definition: to recall fondly/to remember with emotion
favor from an emperor or high official
lit. the kindness of recognizing sb's worth and employing him (idiom)/patronage/protection
a benefactor/a person who has significantly helped sb else
hard to forget even after one's teeth fall out (idiom); to remember a benefactor as long as one lives/undying gratitude
lit. will not be forgotten even after one's teeth fall out/to remember as long as one lives/unforgettable (idiom)
your favor amounts to being given a new lease on life (idiom)
grateful and seeking to repay the kindness (idiom)
